modules.s3_talent_upg: Can use 5 summons. Sand Reckoner and the summons deal 20% increased damage to [Mechanical] enemies. Summons gain **+8 Attack Speed**

modules.base_talent: After deployment, Chilchuck and allies within attack range will be immune to environmental and elemental damage for 45 (50) seconds
modules.s2_talent_upg: After deployment, Chilchuck and allies within attack range will be immune to environmental and elemental damage for **53 (58) seconds**
modules.s3_talent_upg: After deployment, Chilchuck and allies within attack range will be immune to environmental and elemental damage for **60 (65) seconds**

modules.base_talent: After defeating an enemy, Laos will ignore 40% DEF when attacking enemies with the same name.
modules.s2_talent_upg: After defeating an enemy, Laos will ignore **45% DEF** when attacking enemies with the same name.
modules.s3_talent_upg: After defeating an enemy, Laos will ignore **50% DEF** when attacking enemies with the same name.

modules.base_talent: DEF +10%, self-healing +10%
modules.s2_talent_upg: DEF +13%, self-healing +13%
modules.s3_talent_upg: DEF +15%, self-healing +15%

modules.base_talent: Initial Mana +20. When there are 4 [Dungeon Meshi] operators in the squad, all [Dungeon Meshi] operators gain ASPD +25 and DEF +35%
modules.s2_talent_upg: **Initial Mana +35**. When there are 4 [Dungeon Meshi] operators in the squad, all [Dungeon Meshi] operators gain ASPD +25 and DEF +35%
modules.s3_talent_upg: **Initial Mana +40**. When there are 4 [Dungeon Meshi] operators in the squad, all [Dungeon Meshi] operators gain ASPD +25 and DEF +35%

modules.base_talent: Carries 3 <Support Devices> (can only deploy 2 together), each Device grants Barrier equal to 20% (22%) of Catherine's Max HP to an operator (if the target has not been attacked in the last 5 seconds, restore Barrier equal to 6% of Catherine's Max HP every second, this cannot exceed the original amount). Device effects do not stack.
modules.s2_talent_upg: Carries 3 <Support Devices> (can only deploy 2 together), each Device grants Barrier equal to **25% (27%) of Catherine's Max HP** to an operator (if the target has not been attacked in the last 5 seconds, restore Barrier equal to 6% of Catherine's Max HP every second, this cannot exceed the original amount). Device effects do not stack.
modules.s3_talent_upg: Carries 3 <Support Devices> (can only deploy 2 together), each Device grants Barrier equal to **28% (30%) of Catherine's Max HP** to an operator (if the target has not been attacked in the last 5 seconds, restore Barrier equal to 6% of Catherine's Max HP every second, this cannot exceed the original amount). Device effects do not stack.

modules.base_talent: The first attack against every enemy causes them to take 16% (18%) Burn damage every second for 5 seconds
modules.s2_talent_upg: The first attack against every enemy causes them to take 17% (19%) Burn damage every second for 5 seconds
modules.s3_talent_upg: The first attack against every enemy causes them to take 18% (20%) Burn damage every second for 5 seconds

modules.base_talent: Vina and allies within the 8 surrounding tiles receive 20% (22%) less Physical damage. Additionally, Vina gains ATK +5% (6%) for every ally within this range
modules.s2_talent_upg: Vina and allies within the 8 surrounding tiles receive **24% (26%) less Physical damage**. Additionally, Vina **gains ATK +6% (7%)** for every ally within this range
modules.s3_talent_upg: Vina and allies within the 8 surrounding tiles receive **26% (28%) less Physical damage**. Additionally, Vina **gains ATK +7% (8%)** for every ally within this range

modules.base_talent: 3 Dust Motes constantly revolve around Civilight Eterna. When Dust Motes hit an ally, they disappear and increase the Trait effect received by that operator from Civilight Eterna by 1.5x for 6 seconds. Disappeared Dust Motes will reappear after 6 seconds. **When an operator receives the effect of Dust Mote, immediately recover HP equal to 20% of Civilight Eterna's ATK**
modules.s2_talent_upg: 3 Dust Motes constantly revolve around Civilight Eterna. When Dust Motes hit an ally, they disappear and increase the Trait effect received by that operator from Civilight Eterna **by 1.6x** for 6 seconds. Disappeared Dust Motes will reappear after 6 seconds. **When an operator receives the effect of Dust Mote, immediately recover HP equal to 20% of Civilight Eterna's ATK**
modules.s3_talent_upg: 3 Dust Motes constantly revolve around Civilight Eterna. When Dust Motes hit an ally, they disappear and increase the Trait effect received by that operator from Civilight Eterna **by 1.6x** for 6 seconds. Disappeared Dust Motes will reappear after 6 seconds. When an operator receives the effect of Dust Mote, immediately recover HP equal to **30% of Civilight Eterna's ATK**

modules.s2_talent_upg: **ATK +9% (10%)**, ASPD +6 (7), **attacking enemies who are under the active effects of Necrosis Slows them for 0.8s**
modules.s3_talent_upg: **ATK +11% (12%)**, ASPD +6 (7), attacking enemies who are under the active effects of Necrosis Slows them **for 1.2s**

modules.s3_talent_upg: When in squad, all [Siracusa] operators have +5 Initial SP, and when they use skill for the first time, **ASPD +10**
